H0.text: who has trained the most melbourne cup winners. John Hawkes

H1.text: who has trained the most melbourne cup winners. Gai Waterhouse

H2.text: who has trained the most melbourne cup winners. Lee Freedman

H3.text: who has trained the most melbourne cup winners. Bart Cummings

A4.text: In all, Cummings won twelve Melbourne Cups with eleven horses: Light Fingers (1965), Galilee (1966), Red Handed (1967), Think Big (1974 & 1975), Gold and Black (1977), Hyperno (1979), Kingston Rule (1990), Let's Elope (1991), Saintly (1996), Rogan Josh (1999), Viewed (2008).

A5.text: He was known as the Cups King, referring to the Melbourne Cup, as he won 'the race that stops a nation' a record twelve times.
